features: 4-Channel Professional UHF Wireless Microphone System: ●Bietrun 4 mics system adopts 2023 latest Surface Acoustic Wave(SAW) signal connection technology, The connection distance is about 295 feet (90 Meters). without dropouts, hiss, or feedback. ●Clear Voice●Stable signal● high-quality sound● With UHF Selectable frequency band(Use lawful signal bands(500 - 599Mhz) with US FCC ID), With 5 adjustable frequencies per mic, without worrying about interference.

Rechargeable Four Handheld Microphones: ●No AA battery needed. ●The microphones are built-in 1200mAh rechargeable lithium-ion battery, work time up to 7 plus hours with charging time 3-4 hours. ●The dual charging cable is included, support 2 microphones charging simultaneously. ●The receiver has a UL-Certified plug.●Long press the "PWR·VOL" button on the microphone to turn on the mic.

Pro-Clear Vocals Dynamic Mics: Built-in dynamic unidirectional microphone core (95dB±2dB), Crisp, clear sound.without dropouts, hiss, or feedback. ●Cool led light ring (working in green,charging in red), fashionable clear white led display.●ideal for church, conference, speech, web podcast, Yoga instructor, family party, opening ceremony, dancing instructor, promotion etc.

Plug and Play, easy to setup: ●The receiver has 6.35mm Mic and XLR A/B/C/D 4 channels output. ●You can choose 6.35mm cable(included) or XLR cable(Not included) you need to connect the other side to JBL Partybox, Sony SRS-XP series, ION Speaker, Amplifiers, DJ, Audio Mixers, PA system, Karaoke Machine, Multi-Media Equipment, Etc.

1-Year Warranty & Packing List: ●Bietrun offers 1-Year warranty and free replacement service. ●Packing List: 4* Microphone(A,B,C,D), 1*Receiver, 2* Charging Cable,1*Adapter, 4*Microphone Antenna, 1*User Manual, 1*6.35mm to 6.35mm Cable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good & clear sound quality and loud too
reviews.reviewText: I went through quite a few different products trying to find a good and loud and clear wireless microphone and a decent price. I found it here with this product. The plus side was that it has Bluetooth so you can run music through it and still use it as wireless microphone set. I purchased one that one mic was cutting out when I placed my hand at the bottom of the mic to hold it. I given a replacement unit & it worked great. Each mic comes with Volume adjustment up to Vol 5 on top of the Volume buttons for each line on the box itself. These mics are loud and sometimes u have to turn em down a little bit. It's not a bad thing at all, but a good problem to have cause u can adjustment Volume on both mics and the box itself. Voice quality comes out clean and clear, I use these for Djing and people tell me that they are very clear and they are. I even use the Bluetooth to run music through it and through my Mixer with adds and boosts the sound that's going through the mixer. This Bluetooth box has great sound quality even when running music through it. I was impressed with this unit booth sound quality and clarity. If using for Djing or an event or on a professional level these will do great for you, if using for home they will out do that by far hands down...Great unit and I'm so pleased with it and great for its value and quality and clarity and loudness too. Also good quality. Mics are not plastic, they are metal and seem to hold up well. Connection is good too. I didn't test long range because for my applications they all will be within close proximity, a couple feet.And for me it works great... and price is too for all that you get with this unit....

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These work great!
reviews.reviewText: Stunned at how well these work. I've been using them for karaoke shows in bars for over a month, and they do not disappoint. Clear audio, great range, lightweight. The volume controls are very overpowered. I use them with a "1" setting on the mic, and 3 clicks from zero on the receiver. Mids need to be brought down more than the 58s I'm used to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good features but 1 ch stopped working. Decent cust service. Sent a replacement unit under warranty.
reviews.reviewText: One channel stopped working after a few months- problem with base unit not mic (stopped working abruptly). Contacted customer service - they sent a replacement unit. Customer service was responsive. Only email communication- typically a 1 day turnaround time for communications. I had to email a video of the issue showing how 1 channel was not working. (Creating and emailing videos can be challenging for some…).As far as the unit goes,It works well, Versatile, Comes with multiple connectors.Reasonably good sound quality. Need to hold the mic in a certain position.But works well for most situations. Very easy to setup and operate including built-in bluetooth connectivity.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good karaoke mic system - does exactly what I need it for
reviews.reviewText: I bought on a lightning deal and also cuz of the pandemic quarantine to spice things up at home. I used to go out sporadically to karaoke places. My wife is into it more than I am but seems to have reversed- I have used this more than she has.This is a lower end model. There are no tone controls on the receiver - the mics (you get two) are color coded. They are made of plastic not the best but it’s adequate for the paid price.Here’s my set up:I hooked up a laptop hdmi out to a Sony TV - I bluetooth the sound from the laptop to the bietrun (pairing is easy - and a lady with a heavy Chinese accent says it’s successful- from the bietrun i hardwire it to a schiit audio magni 1 (original Verizon) headphone amplifier so I can control volume - then u plug into the headphone Jack of a 1990s pair of active self powered speakers (Sony SRS-150). I didn’t want to hook it up to my AVR and it works great!!! Even though the speakers are about 20 watts per channel it fills the room. I use The old you tube for the backing tracks.The signal reception from mic to receiving device is great. It is very clear but I don’t have a big living space.The mics control the rudimentary echo (reverb) remember to put it to full max when you’re singing “in the air tonight” it rocks, treble, bass, and volume of the mics. Each mic can control their own. The tone controls aren’t great but good enough.I’ve had this for a couple months now and used it 4x? It’s worth a pick up if you want something simple and you’re not a hardcore karaoke gotta have the best sound system. It’s good for people who just wanna belt out a few tunes now and again.Thanks for reading.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome Rechargeable Wireless Microphone

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Complete Waste of Money
reviews.reviewText: Bought this product for a working event band, based on earlier reviews and user recommendations! I will say they are very user friendly and simple to plug and play. The bluetooth connection is an absolute plus for weddings and banquets, good for ambience music. That being said, they have a 50ft range at best. After 3 attempts given for them to redeem themselves...... Continuous drop outs during speechs and solo selections! Static when electronics cross between the mics and receiver. They always perform well in sound checks and small backyard parties. Anything over 40 guests with phones and bluetooth electronics affects ALL the frequency options! I wish I could get my money back. Has gotten me bad reviews for failure during critical moments!****Update****After more experimenting with the receiver placement and antenna extensions, ive been having better results. Been using them in less important situations, i.e bar gigs! Still not ready to try on wedding or speaking engagements yet, but i am going to try using them for stationary band member vocals..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Looks nice but definitely not professional quality
reviews.reviewText: I bought the set because the microphones are rechargeable and look nice but very disappointing that the microphones are not anywhere near professional quality as advertised. They pick up lots of noises and the receiver produces hissing noises on loss of speech.

Estos micrófonos la voz se escucha bien, se usan para coros, lo que no me gusta esque mete interferencias aunque cambies el canal y eso que el receptor está a una distancia de aproximadamente 4metros, no los volvería a comprar me iría por otra marca mejor

reviews.reviewTitle: Practicos para cualquiera y buen sonido
reviews.reviewText: Suenan bastante bien y si tienen buena señal.Se conectan instantáneamente y con facilidad al encenderlos.Los controles de eco, treble + bass y volumen son muy prácticos.Vienen con una variedad de cables e incluso el cable de corriente micro Usb y su cargador.El empaque es bastante profesional. Excelente.Lo único que no me gusto es el ruido que genera atravez del cable auxiliar, pero al contar con otras opciones de conexión puedes probar lo que mejor se adapte.Me gusta.
Shipping on time and the item is good.
